name: Pokemon Nightmare Version (English Translation)
description:
A (rough) fan translation of the original German Pokemon Horror game by 

Xargoth.

I try to be as faithful to the original as possible.

I did not make this game, I only translated the existing text. (I would give a link to the original German version, but I can't find it.)

The main menu and save screen remain unchanged.

I recommend that you use EasyRPG to play this as I couldn't even get it to launch without it.
